content: CP- 605 Bottom-of-wall firestop sealant Low-shrinkage and easy-to-dispense firestop sealant for fire-rated and non-rated bottom of walls ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Sealants, sprays and coatings- - - ### FEATURES:Features Odorless – ideal for occupied buildings such as hospitals, schools, airports, etc. Soft foil packaging – reduces waste compared to hard cartridges Contains no hazardous ingredients listed in Prop 65 – also MEP-free and DINP-free (phthalate-containing substances) Low shrinkage (< 25%) according to ASTM C 1241 Applications Sealing bottom-of-wall joints in approved fire-rated assemblies For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 43.21 g/l Base materials: Concrete, Drywall, Masonry, Metal Application temperature range: 35 - 104 °F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 43.21 g/l | Base materials | Concrete, Drywall, Masonry, Metal | Application temperature range | 35 - 104 °F | Approx. cure time | 3 mm/3 days | 1 | Can be painted | Yes | Product Class | Ultimate | Color | White | at 75°F/24°C, 50% relative humidity ### ITEMS- 2123410 - Bottom of Wall Sealant CP 605 580ml - Package Size 20 pc - 3544905 - CP605 bottom of wall - pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 600x Bottom of Wall Sealant CP 605 580ml
